mapper.insert: insert into rank_info (id, rankid, rankname, updateTime, appname) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rankid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rankname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{appname,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
